msbt.message: I'm still OBSESSED with the gift you delivered from Santa, you know. It's so cute!Ahhit's almost like the day after Toy Day is better than Toy Day!
OK, this is random, butyou know how sometimes you can't sleep the night before Toy Day?I couldn't sleep the night AFTER Toy Day. I was just tooooo happy that you delivered Santa's gift!
It was totes fun to trade gifts with you yesterday, !I hope you liked what I got you. I read, like, 30 of the trendiest lifestyle e-magazines to pick it out.
OK, are you ready to hear the big winner of Toy Day this year? Drumroll, please<10_4 /> It wasUS!Our gift exchange won "Cutest Gift Exchange on ," and it wasn't even close!
Do you even KNOW how great my Toy Day was, thanks to you? It was tr√®s awesome, !Not only did you deliver Santa's gift, but you made time to exchange with me as well. You are too much!
So yesterday I got not one, not two, not three, butno, wait. I got TWO ultra-special gifts. From you and Santa! I am going to just SOAK in this festive feeling for as long as possible, .
Ohmigosh, Toy Day came and went so fast that it feels like it didn't even happen!We didn't even trade gifts, did we? Ugh! I def want a rain check on that for next year, OK?
Did you have a good Toy Day yesterday? Because, uh, I sure did! I had the most deLISH Toy Day cake!Come to think of it, I still have some left over. It's a day-after Toy Day miracle, !
